title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 831.6 - Proposed revisions and changes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 831.6 - Proposed revisions and changes

State Regulations

Proposals for changes and additions to the comprehensive
plan submitted by any agency of the signatory parties or any interested person, organization or group shall identify the specific revision or change
recommended. In order to permit adequate commission consideration of any
proposal, the executive director may require such additional information as may
be needed. Review or consideration of such proposals shall be based upon the
recommendation of the executive director and the further direction of the
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
831.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
